Uttaravinicchaya：A commentary on the Vinaya Pitaka，written by Buddhadatta as a supplement to his own Vinaya-Vinicchaya．



In manuscripts the two works are usually found together．



It was dedicated by the author to one of his pupils Sankhapāla．



Vācissara wrote a tīkā on it．Gv．59，62．



The work has been published by the P．T．S．（1928）．
